tool.name: ProteinProphet

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the value will be passed in the argument list (ie. the switch won't be used)
parameter_list.helptext: Input pep xml files.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Do not generate plot png file.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Non-conservative maximum protein list.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Highlight peptide cysteines.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Highlight peptide N-glycosylation motif.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Check peptide's total weight in the Protein Group against the threshold (default: check peptide's actual weight against threshold).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Equivalent to MINPROB=0.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Compute ASAP ratios for protein entries (ASAP must have been run previously on interact dataset).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Import manual changes to AAP ratios (after initially using ASAP option).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Normalize NSP using Protein Length.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Use the log of the probabilities in the Confidence calculations.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Use the EM to compute probability given the confidence.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Consider all possible peptides in the database in the confidence model.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Report results for UNMAPPED proteins.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Report Protein Length.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Use Expected Number of Ion Instances to adjust the peptide probabilities prior to NSP adjustment.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Get protein mol weights.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Input is from iProphet.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: New and improved compute ASAP ratios for protein entries (ASAP must have been run previously on all input interact datasets with mz/XML raw data format).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Do not use peptide degeneracy information when assessing proteins.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Write output tab delim xls file including all peptides.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated joined with an equals(=) character with no spaces.
parameter_list.helptext: Filter away results with a probability less than MINPROB (default=0.05).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated joined with an equals(=) character with no spaces.
parameter_list.helptext: Minimum percentage of independent peptides required for a protein (default=0).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated joined with an equals(=) character with no spaces.
parameter_list.helptext: Fudge factor to scale MU calculation (default 1).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated joined with an equals(=) character with no spaces.
parameter_list.helptext: Write output tab delim xls file including all protein (group)s minimum probability xx, where xx is a number between 0 and 1.

tool.description: ProteinProphet is a tool for generating probablities for protein identifications based on MS/MS data. ProteinProphet makes use of results from PeptideProphet, which produces validation results for peptide sequence identifications.
